block_list.title: Video Tutorial
block_list.body: This is the Star Clipper designed by Andrew Dewar, the 42th member of our 100 Exotic Paper Airplane challenge. This plane resembles a futuristic aircraft taking off into the sky. I will be the first to admit that this is a really difficult plane to fly. It requires a lot of tuning to fly nice and when it nose dive to the ground you will need to calibrate it again. Please enjoy this new Origami paper airplane. If you missed my last Exotic Paper Airplane "Paper Plane 041 : F-14 Tomcat by Michael G. LaFosse", you could watch it at https://youtu.be/J3XlJgYhDZY Thanks For Watching! Wilson Lee @Heap Art
